oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The evolution of dairy cattle welfare
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Cook, Nigel
von Keyserlingk, Marina
Walker, Jennifer
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: dairy
welfare
audits
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this article we discuss the evolution of dairy cattle welfare, the approaches being taken to improve welfare in other coun­tries and the recent changes that have been taking place in the U.S. and Canada. The role of the veterinarian as a leader in the animal welfare discussion is addressed, along with the grow­ing list of concerns for the dairy industry in maintaining public trust, and the changes that we predict are needed in current au­diting procedures.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; No. 56 (2023): 2023 Annual Conference Proceedings ; 46-48
